data.question: What is the highest photothermal conversion efficiency reported for organic co-crystal materials according to the text?
What metal nodes are used in the construction of the MOF-stabilized co-crystals?
What is the intermolecular distance between charge transfer pairs in the MOF structure?
What is the role of pyrene in the MOF-stabilized co-crystals?
What is the main advantage of using MOF-stabilized co-crystals for photothermal therapy?
data.answer: They can be dispersed in aqueous solution.

data.question: What is the ligand used in the electron-deficient MOF?
Why do organic co-crystals have limited stability in aqueous solutions?
data.answer: Due to intrinsic supramolecular interactions within organic co-crystals.

data.question: How does the MOF structure affect the charge transfer interaction between D and A?
data.answer: The MOF structure enhances the charge-transfer interaction between D and A.

data.question: Why does the Py@Ca-NDI MOF co-crystal exhibit significant absorption enhancement in visible to near infrared regions?
data.answer: Due to the strong charge transfer interaction between pyrene/NDI.

data.question: What is the effect of the MOF structure on the photothermal performance of Py@Ca-NDI in water?
data.answer: The MOF structure allows Py@Ca-NDI to maintain its photothermal performance in water.

data.question: How does the photothermal conversion efficiency of Py@Ca-NDI compare to the FDA approved photothermal agent ICG?
data.answer: Py@Ca-NDI has a higher photothermal conversion efficiency than ICG.

data.question: What is the significance of the hostâ€“guest MOF co-crystal platform?
data.answer: It amplifies the charge-transfer interaction, subsequent photon absorption, and photon conversion efficiency of co-crystals.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of organic co-crystals is complex and tedious.
True or False: The photothermal conversion efficiency of Py@Ca-NDI is the highest among reported organic co-crystal materials.
True or False: The MOF structure does not affect the dispersion of co-crystals in aqueous solution.
True or False: Py@Ca-NDI can be used for biological applications without being dispersed in aqueous solution.
True or False: The charge transfer interaction between D and A in MOF-stabilized co-crystals is not tailorable.
True or False: The MOF structure does not enhance the photothermal conversion efficiency of co-crystals.
True or False: The photothermal effect of Py@Ca-NDI in water is independent of the concentration of Py@Ca-NDI.
True or False: The MOF structure of Py@Ca-NDI does not contribute to its photothermal stability in aqueous solution.
